snippet: Super Rugby's top two try-scorers will be on show Saturday when the New South Wales Waratahs host the Crusaders in the final in Sydney, Australia.
lead_paragraph: Super Rugby's top two try-scorers will be on show Saturday when the New South Wales Waratahs host the Crusaders in the final in Sydney, Australia.
